creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: maroon and grey striped fabric; embroidery - 10 rows - around neckline (keyhole shape); geometric patterns - knots, ovals and triangles on front and back; sleeves open to bottom edge; 6" seam along bottom, each sleeve
title: Agbada, from a three-piece set
